contest-event.event-date: April 2, 1945 D Midlands Area (Third Section) Midlands Area (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-third-section National Championship of Great Britain (Third Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Third De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK Did this planned section take place? A 1947 finals programme lists all section winners, but leaves this section blank. Advert in Brass Band News February 1945 states Third Section Junior Championship and gives prizes, May B.B.N. gives result of 3rd section as you recorded as Youth Section, so they were same section. Brass Band News May 1945 shows 18th annual Leicester Band Festival was also Midland Area Contest. Section Three results are what you have recorded as Youth Section. Think you have it right as the Youth Contest as City of Coventry A.T.C. finished 3rd in the National Final Youth Section Septmber 29 th at Belle Vue Sept. 30, 2011, 1:07 p.m. April 21, 2019, 8:15 p.m.
